name: Tap, Tap Cat
description:
Tap Tap Cat

A game developed over the course of around 9 days for the GentleX Contest. Play as a cat as you try to dodge fireballs and collect coins for no reason at all.

uuh there are lots of bugs so when every you die click the flag

Instructions

Click and place on the screen

Dodge Fireballs

Collect coins for no points

Have fun

Credits:

sound effects by me

Music I found on youtube

All code and art by me (except for the score engine i got of somebody i forgot)

It would be very swag to let me win a contest since in September I'm starting school again and now i got to do stuffz likes learning about the quadratic formula of the krabby patty and Science. I hate science
